titleStmt.title: To His Grace His Majesties High Commissioner, and the Honourable Estates of Parliament. The humble petition of John Weir of Newton.
titleStmt.author: Weir, John, of Newton, fl. 1695.
Scotland. Parliament. Committee of Estates.

notesStmt.note: For the payment of damages awarded to him against John Hamilton of Gilkerscleugh.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
